channel.title: I got an error when registering my server to the list -*[Help]*-
channel.description:
[code] Click here to play the MoparScape 3.2 webclient. Click here to download MoparScape 3.2. Click here to go to the forums.
Click here for hamachi servers (not recommended)
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = '[[My Servers IP Weny here]]' OR `ipfield` = '71.250.157.48'' at line 1 [code/]
Please help me with this error code! [/code]
